references.reason: This is the main paper of the current work and introduces the novel Parameter-Inverted Image Pyramid Networks (PIIP) architecture.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces CLIP, a foundational model used in several experiments in the current work.

references.paper_title: Training data-efficient image transformers & distillation through attention
references.reason: This paper introduces DeiT, a vision transformer architecture used as a backbone for several experiments.
This paper introduces Mask R-CNN, a popular object detection model used as a baseline.

references.paper_title: Feature pyramid networks for object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces Feature Pyramid Networks (FPN), a commonly used multi-scale feature extraction method.
